lines.speaker: Secretary
lines.text: Oh, you’re here about the scholarship, right? I figured as much.

lines.speaker: Secretary
lines.text:
Here’s what you need:
- Your birth certificate (MVR can help with that)
- Grade transcripts (your teacher handles that)
- CV and Motivation Letter (your problem)
- Proof of language skills

lines.speaker: Secretary
lines.text: And don’t bother coming back if you don’t bring all of this.
